[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1703318091805{margin-top: -200px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” el_class=”shadow-box”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]Where Living Meets Solutions[vc_column_text]

Smart Lighting

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Lighting is the complementing factor of architecture, furniture
Smart lighting refers to lighting systems that can be controlled remotely or automated using smart devices like smartphones, tablets, or voice assistants. They often allow you to adjust brightness, color, and scheduling, offering convenience, energy efficiency, and customization options for your home or workspace.

Experts in home technology ..

Home automation involves using technology to control and automate household systems and devices, such as lighting, heating, ventilation, air conditioning, appliances, security cameras, and more. It enables remote monitoring and control, scheduling, and often integrates with voice commands or mobile apps for convenient management of various aspects of your home.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1534249300597{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 80px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background: #f5f5f5 url(https://futuretechliving.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/vertical-lines-3.png?id=10096) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”animate”][vc_media_grid element_width=”3″ gap=”0″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1704352440181-d8ae8e0e7ba55b8b446c594bc9bc4d65-3″ include=”13854,13855,13856,13857,13858,13859,13860,13861,13862,13863,13864,13865,13867,13868,13869,13870,13871,13872,13873,13874,13875,13876,13877,13878,13879,13880,13881,13882,13883″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1534249583449{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column]

Where Living Meets Solutions

[vc_column_text el_class=”animate” css=”.vc_custom_1703227227373{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Functional, stylish & practical living solutions.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1703227433284{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Functional Home

Where every space is designed with purpose, optimizing both comfort and efficiency.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Quality Service

Ensuring excellence in every aspect of home enhancement and care.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Certified Professionals

Trained experts dedicated to delivering trusted and top-tier living solutions.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1703227162511{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”animate”]

Nicole Pratt

Team Member

Highly recommend their service!

When my husband and I were looking for a new media wall design, we knew it had to be Future Tech Living Solutions. They created the most modern design that can blend in with any surrounding. The installation process was seamless and they really made our old house feel brand new. Highly recommend their service!

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
